title: Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian assistance of the United Nations
text:
United Nations 
A/80/L.36
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-20160 (E)    091225     
*2520160* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 72 (a) 
Strengthening of the coordination of humanitarian and 
disaster relief assistance of the United Nations, including 
special economic assistance: strengthening of the coordination 
of emergency humanitarian assistance of the United Nations 
 
 
 
 
 
Russian Federation:* amendment to draft resolution A/80/L.25  
 
 
 
 Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian 
assistance of the United Nations 
 
 
 
After operative paragraph 89, insert the following operative paragraph: 
 
Calls upon Member States to refrain from promulgating and applying any 
unilateral coercive measures, as they affect social and humanitarian conditions, owing 
to the deterioration in public services and a shortage of essential food and health 
items, with impacts on the most vulnerable, further hindering the efficiency of United 
Nations operations and delivery of humanitarian and development assistance on the 
ground; 
 
 
 
* Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting.
